title: UConn Basketball First Night Exhibition
text:
Caption UConn First Night Lauren Schneiderman / Hartford Courant Josh Massey, 13 of West Hartford gets UCONN women's head basketball coach Geno Auriemma's autographduring first night at UCONN on Friday.
